body.p:
St Louis May 28/62
Jas. W Tate Esq
Frankfort
Ky
Dear Sir

Your Esteemed favor of 24.th with my Commission is at hand, for which please accept thanks I Enclose. my official oath impression of seal & Signature together with $5 to pay state tax I also take the liberty of Enclosing one of my Cards. which I shall be obliged if you will hang up in your office
